name: Urban Threads Welcome Discount
description: New customer special! Get 10% off on your first purchase from Urban Threads Co. Minimum purchase Rp 200,000.

name: Elegance Boutique Premium Discount
description: Exclusive 15% discount for all Elegance Boutique products. Perfect for upgrading your wardrobe. Min. purchase Rp 200,000.

name: Trendsetter Fashion Mega Sale
description: Mega sale alert! Enjoy 20% off on all Trendsetter Fashion items. Limited time only. Min. purchase Rp 200,000.

name: Luxury Wardrobe VIP Discount
description: VIP treatment for our customers! Get 25% off on premium collections. Minimum purchase Rp 200,000 required.

name: Style Vault Super Savings
description: Super savings event! Get 30% off on all Style Vault products. Best deals in town. Min. purchase Rp 200,000.

name: Men's Collection Special
description: Exclusive discount for men's fashion! Get 15% off on all men's category products. Minimum purchase Rp 150,000.

name: Women's Collection Special
description: Ladies, treat yourself! Enjoy 15% off on all women's category products. Minimum purchase Rp 150,000.

name: Sitewide Welcome Bonus
description: Welcome to our platform! Get 5% off on all purchases sitewide. Perfect for new customers. Minimum purchase Rp 500,000.
